code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../../App.css';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import RandomColorCardItem from'../RandomColorCardItem';import'../Cards.css';import Footer from'../Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TeacherCourseHome(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:8081/coursehome').then(res=>{if(res.data.valid){setName(res.data.name);const userId=sessionStorage.getItem('userId');console.log("User ID course home frontend: ",userId);if(userId){axios.get("http://localhost:8081/teacherCourses/".concat(userId)).then(res=>{setCourses(res.data.courses);}).catch(err=>console.log(err));}}else{navigate('/login');}}).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cards",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:require('/Users/alyssaingerson/Documents/GitHub/TheLearningLab/my-app/frontend/src/logo.jpeg'),alt:"logo image",height:100,width:100}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[name,"'s Courses"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{style:{color:'gray',backgroundColor:'gray',height:1,margin:0}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/courses",className:"btn bg-primary rounded-0",style:{position:'absolute',top:'90px',right:'10px'},children:"Create Course"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards__container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"cards__items",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RandomColorCardItem,{text:course.courseName,path:"/teachercourse/".concat(course.course_id)},course.course_id))})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})})]})});}
